main event: A ground-radar observation of an unidentified object was reported in Denton, Nebraska, on March 22, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped and appeared to be the size of a tennis ball at a distance, The object emitted a close-up silver-white light with no sound, The sighting involved very rapid movement in the opposite direction of conventional aircraft, Witnesses suggested the object might be a balloon, Observers included a housewife and her children who witnessed the event together.
